an5.22:1.1: “Mendicants, it’s simply impossible for a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with incompatible lifestyle to fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.22:1.2: Without fulfilling the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s impossible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.22:1.3: Without fulfilling the practice of a trainee, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of ethics.
an5.22:1.4: Without fulfilling the entire spectrum of ethics, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of immersion.
an5.22:1.5: Without fulfilling the entire spectrum of immersion, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom.
an5.22:2.1: But it is possible for a respectful and reverent mendicant with compatible lifestyle to fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.22:2.2: Having fulfilled the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s possible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.22:2.3: Having fulfilled the practice of a trainee, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of ethics.
an5.22:2.4: Having fulfilled the entire spectrum of ethics, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of immersion.
an5.22:2.5: Having fulfilled the entire spectrum of immersion, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom.”
